short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making a predefined position ad size screenshots

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can predefine place and size of screenshots that you want to make. 
Its designed with double click in mind but it is working on every website. 
Screenshots are working on localhost as well. 
You can use chrome Animation tab to chose time of the banner animation. 

There are options to define your own place on the website where you want to make screenshots.
